mapper.select: SELECT * FROM department WHERE id LIKE '%BD%' AND use_yn ='Y'
SELECT e.*, d.text, d.id, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_count FROM education e JOIN department d ON e.id = d.id ORDER BY e.no DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT e.*,u.name,d.`text` FROM education e JOIN user u ON e.username = u.username JOIN department d ON e.id = d.id WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE education SET category=#{category}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, url=#{url}, updater=#{username}, id=#{id}, total_time=#{total_time} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM education_history WHERE no = #{no} AND username = #{username}

SELECT ds.parent, ds.name AS dept_name, u.name, eh.education_date, e2.`no` FROM direct_store ds LEFT JOIN `user` u ON ds.owner = u.username LEFT JOIN education_history eh ON ds.owner = eh.username AND eh.`no` = #{no} LEFT JOIN education e2 ON eh.`no` = e2.`no` WHERE ds.parent = #{id}
